hadiths.text: Yazid bin Ziyad bin Abi Al-Ja'd narrated from Habib bin Abi Thabit, who said:"I heard Ibn 'Umar say: 'The Messenger of Allah forbade Ruqba and said: "Whoever is given something on the basis of Ruqba, it belongs to him

chapter.ara-name: باب ذِكْرِ اخْتِلاَفِ أَلْفَاظِ النَّاقِلِينَ لِخَبَرِ جَابِرٍ فِي الْعُمْرَى
chapter.eng-name: Mentioning The Different Versions Of The Report Of Jabir Concerning 'Umra
